content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord eager to maximize my profit, I have set my initial asking price high for this prime location apartment. However, I am open to negotiation in hopes of finding a mutually agreeable rate. Do let me know your proposed rental price for us to discuss further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 450 euros per month is a reasonable price for this apartment. It is a good balance between the value of the apartment and the financial capabilities of most tenants.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While your suggested rental price of 450 Euros per month is somewhat appealing, it does not align with my target for optimal returns on this investment. To continue or conclude our negotiation, please propose a higher rental amount that better suits my objectives.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, Mister Schmidt. I propose 480 euros per month for the apartment. This price is still affordable for many tenants, but it also reflects the quality and central location of the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your proposed rental price of 480 Euros per month, though a slight improvement compared to your initial suggestion, is still insufficient to meet my financial expectations for this exceptionally desirable property. I regret to say that I must decline this offer and await a more attractive proposal. If you wish to withdraw from further negotiation, please indicate so with an appropriate reason.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize for the misunderstanding, Mister Schmidt. I propose 500 euros per month for the apartment. This price is not much higher than my previous offer, but I hope it aligns better with your financial expectations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your revised rental price of 500 Euros per month is considerably more in line with my objectives as the apartment owner. While I would ideally seek a slightly higher amount, I am inclined to accept this offer as it reflects a fair compromise for both parties. I agree to the price of 500 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
